justification: "We designed an adapted version of the task 'The Zoo Game' ... to evaluate the ability to inhibit prepotent or automatized responses based on the GO / No GO paradigm."
"The suppression of interference from distractors is evaluated using a modified version of the 'The Flanker' task..."
"This task ... based on the n-back paradigm used to assess the ability to update working memory."
"To evaluate set-shifting ability, we designed a version of the 'Dimensional Change Card Sort' task..."

"This is an adaptation of the task developed by Scheres et al. ... designed to assess the ability to delay gratification."
